scripts.predist: mkdir -p docker/dist && cp package.json docker/dist && cp src/index.js docker/dist
scripts.release: yarn build && yarn deploy && yarn git-tag-release
scripts.git-commit: git commit -m "Incrementing release version of BossTaxAccounting to $npm_package_version"
scripts.git-publish: git push -u origin HEAD:master && git push --tags
scripts.git-tag-release: yarn git-add && yarn git-commit && yarn git-tag && yarn git-publish
